author: nico_sz
content:
I started to play with Brownie on Kintsugi :
```
# brownie networks add Ethereum kintsugi  host=https://rpc.kintsugi.themerge.dev/ chain_id=1337702

# mkdir /tmp/testingthemerge ; cd /tmp/testingthemerge
# brownie init

# brownie console --network kintsugi
```
```
>>> accounts.add()

<LocalAccount '0x72...'>
>>> accounts[0].balance()
0
```

Copy the created account and go to the faucet:
https://faucet.kintsugi.themerge.dev/

```
>>> accounts[0].balance()
50000000000000000000

"""Create a new account"""
>>> accounts.add()
"""Send some Ether"""
>>> accounts[0].transfer(accounts[1], "1 ether")
...
>>> accounts[1].balance()
1000000000000000000
```
